article_title: Tim and April audition for Star Wars
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

(KTVI) - Tim Ezell decided to follow his dream and audition for the new Star Wars movie. He met with Star Wars casting representative Maryellen Aviano to give it his best shot.

Tim and April Simpson read lines for Aviano and got her feedback on their future in show business.

For those who missed the Star Wars casting event, they are still accepting audition tapes online.

To submit a casting tape, visit: http://opencastingcall2013.com/
